mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product(product_id, order_id, product_name, color, price, volume, category, filename) VALUES (NULL, #{order_id}, #{product_name}, #{color}, #{price}, #{volume}, #{category}, #{filename})

INSERT INTO product(product_id, nonMemberOrder_id, product_name, color, price, volume, category, filename) VALUES (NULL, #{nonMemberOrder_id}, #{product_name}, #{color}, #{price}, #{volume}, #{category}, #{filename})
